item.title: US regulators approve Wegovy pill for weight loss
item.description: U.S. regulators have approved a pill version of the weight-loss drug Wegovy

item.title: FCC bans new Chinese-made drones, citing security risks
item.description: The Federal Communications Commission says it will ban new foreign-made drones, a move that will keep new Chinese-made drones out of the U.S. market
